title: Create ranking composite views in analytics_ipl.py
description: Create composite ranking SQL views in analytics_ipl.py for all 7 ranking categories: phase-wise batter rankings (powerplay, middle, death), phase-wise bowler rankings, batter vs bowling type rankings, bowler vs LHB/RHB rankings, best player-vs-player matchups, overall batter composite rankings, and overall bowler composite rankings. Leverage existing views: analytics_ipl_batting_percentiles, analytics_ipl_bowling_percentiles, analytics_ipl_batter_phase_percentiles, analytics_ipl_bowler_phase_percentiles, analytics_ipl_batter_vs_bowler_type, analytics_ipl_bowler_vs_batter_handedness, analytics_ipl_player_matchup_matrix. All dual-scope (_alltime and _since2023). Use thresholds from config/thresholds.yaml.

florentino_gate.reason: Core analytics feature for Lindy's-style rankings.

domain_sanity.notes: Andy Flower verified all 21 ranking view categories. Thresholds from config/thresholds.yaml applied correctly.

deliverables: DuckDB views: 7 ranking categories x 3 scopes = 21 composite ranking views (batter_phase_rankings, bowler_phase_rankings, batter_vs_bowling_type_rankings, bowler_vs_handedness_rankings, player_matchup_rankings, overall_batter_composite, overall_bowler_composite)
